# cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files (Data Source)

Used to retrieve files from a bucket. Optionally filter by folder path. Bucket has to be accessible from the Cloud Temple's Console in order to get it's files listed.

To query this datasource you will need the `object-storage_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all files in a bucket
data "cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files" "all_files" {
  bucket_name = "my-bucket"
}

output "all_files" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files.all_files.files
}

# List files in a specific folder
data "cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files" "folder_files" {
  bucket_name = "my-bucket"
  folder_path = "documents/reports"
}

output "folder_files" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files.folder_files.files
}

# Filter files by size
output "large_files" {
  value = [
    for file in data.cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files.all_files.files :
    file if file.size > 1000000 # Files larger than 1MB
  ]
}

# Get the latest version of each file
output "latest_versions" {
  value = [
    for file in data.cloudtemple_object_storage_bucket_files.all_files.files : {
      key = file.key
      version = [
        for v in file.versions :
        v if v.is_latest
      ][0]
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket_name` (String) The name of the bucket.

### Optional

- `folder_path` (String) Optional folder path to filter files. If not specified, returns all files in the bucket.

### Read-Only

- `files` (List of Object) The list of files in the bucket. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--files))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--files"></a>
### Nested Schema for `files`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `last_modified` (String)
- `size` (Number)
- `tags` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--files--tags))
- `versions` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--files--versions))

<a id="nestedobjatt--files--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `files.tags`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)


<a id="nestedobjatt--files--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `files.versions`

Read-Only:

- `is_delete_marker` (Boolean)
- `is_latest` (Boolean)
- `last_modified` (String)
- `size` (Number)
- `version_id` (String)
